#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>

using namespace std;

main()
{
int fall, a[110], b[510], c[510], f, bb, i, k, j, n, h;
char s[510];

a['Z']=1;
a['U']=9;
a['T']=7;
a['Q']=3;
a['E']=5;

for(cin >> fall; fall--;)
	{
	cin >> s;
	n=strlen(s);
	f=bb=i=k=0;

	while((!(s[i]>='0' && s[i]<='9'))&&i<n)
		f+=a[s[i++]];

	c[k]=s[i++]-48;
	h=1;

	while(i<n)
		{
		while((!(s[i]>='0' && s[i]<='9'))&&i<n)
			bb+=a[s[i++]];
		b[k++]=f-bb;
		h=0;
		
		if(s[i]!='\0')
			{
			c[k]=s[i++]-48;
			h=1;
			f=bb;
			bb=0;
			}
		}

	if(h)
		b[k++]=f;

	for(i=0; i<k-1; i++)
		for(j=i+1; j<k; j++)
			if(b[i]>=b[j])
				{
				f=b[i];
				b[i]=b[j];
				b[j]=f;
				f=c[i];
				c[i]=c[j];
				c[j]=f;
				}

	for(i=0; i<k; i++)
		cout << c[i];
	cout << endl;

	}

return 0;
}
